Name: Gil Junger
Bio: Gil Junger is an American director, most famous for 10 Things I Hate About You, his directorial film debut.

Name: Betty Thomas
Bio: Betty Thomas is an American director and actress.

Name: Michael Stephen
Bio: Michael Stephen Lehmann is an American film and television director known for directing the dark comedy Heathers.

Name: Dennie Gordon
Bio: Dennie Gordon is an American film and television director.

Name: Amy Heckerling
Bio: Amy Heckerling is an American writer, producer, and director.

Name: Roger Kumble
Bio: Roger Kumble is an American film director, screenwriter, and playwright.

Name: Richard Kelly
Bio: James Richard Kelly is an American film director, screenwriter and producer.

Name: Richard Linklater
Bio: Richard Stuart Linklater is an American film director, producer, and screenwriter.

Name: Tina Fey
Bio: Elizabeth Stamatina "Tina" Fey is an American comedian, actress, writer, and producer.
